environment.value: function process(data) { if(data['ENVIRONMENT']) { var env = data['ENVIRONMENT'].toUpperCase(); if(['LIVE', 'TEST', 'INTERNAL_TEST'].includes(env)) return env; } return 'LIVE'; }

activationStatus.value: function process(data) { if(data['ACTIVATION_STATUS']) { var status = data['ACTIVATION_STATUS'].toUpperCase(); if(['ACTIVE', 'NOT_APPLIED', 'APPLICATION_UNDER_REVIEW', 'REJECTED', 'OFFBOARDED'].includes(status)) return status; } return 'ACTIVE'; }
